alert.note: Alert for Marathon; Menominee; Outagamie; Shawano; Waupaca (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 5:33PM CDT until June 15 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN MARATHON...MENOMINEE...WAUPACA...NORTHWESTERN OUTAGAMIE AND SHAWANO COUNTIES... At 533 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Wittenberg to 12 miles east of Bevent to near Chain O` Lakes-King, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Neopit, Clintonville, Keshena, Embarrass, South Branch, Big Smokey Falls, Legend Lake and Navarino Wildlife Area. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for central, northeastern and east central Wisconsin. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
